text: Steve Cannon (April 10, 1935 â€“ July 7, 2019) was an American writer. He was born in New Orleans, Louisiana. He was known as the founder of the cultural organization A Gathering of the Tribes. Cannon went completely blind in 1989 from glaucoma. Cannon died on July 7, 2019 from septic shock caused by a ruptured cyst at a hospital in New York City at the age of 84.Poet Steve Cannon, 84, of A Gathering of the Tribes ==Bibliography== * * * * * ==References== Category:1935 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Deaths from sepsis Category:20th-century American novelists Category:American playwrights Category:Writers from New Orleans
title: Steve Cannon (writer)
